urls.title: Job Board URLs
urls.description: Greenhouse job board URLs to scrape. To filter by department, limit jobs, or fetch recent jobs only, switch to JSON tab and add: {"url": "...", "departments": [59798], "maxJobs": 20, "daysBack": 7}. The daysBack parameter filters jobs updated in the last N days (useful for scheduled runs). Find department IDs by clicking a department filter on the job board and copying the number from the URL (e.g., ?departments[]=59798).
